    • Constructor Detail

      • Icmp6NeighborAdvertisementMessage

        public Icmp6NeighborAdvertisementMessage(Ip6Address src_addr,
                                         Ip6Address dst_addr,
                                         boolean r_flag,
                                         boolean s_flag,
                                         boolean o_flag,
                                         Ip6Address target_address,
                                         Icmp6Option[] options)
        Creates a new ICMP message.
        Parameters:
        src_addr - IP source address
        dst_addr - IP destination address
        r_flag - the "Router" flag. When set, the R-bit indicates that the sender is a router
        s_flag - the "Solicited" flag. When set, the S-bit indicates that the advertisement was sent in response to a Neighbor Solicitation from the Destination address
        o_flag - the "Override" flag. When set, the O-bit indicates that the advertisement should override an existing cache entry and update the cached link-layer address
        target_address - target address. For solicited advertisements, the target address field in the Neighbor Solicitation message that prompted this advertisement. For an unsolicited advertisement, the address whose link-layer address has changed
        options - array of options

      • Icmp6NeighborAdvertisementMessage

        public Icmp6NeighborAdvertisementMessage(Ip6Address src_addr,
                                         Ip6Address dst_addr,
                                         byte[] buf,
                                         int off,
                                         int len)
        Creates a new ICMP message.
        Parameters:
        src_addr - IP source address
        dst_addr - IP destination address
        buf - the buffer containing the ICMP message
        off - the offset within the buffer
        len - the length of the ICMP message

      • Icmp6NeighborAdvertisementMessage

        public Icmp6NeighborAdvertisementMessage(Icmp6Message msg)
        Creates a new ICMP message.
        Parameters:
        msg - the ICMP message
